name: UAnimBoneCompressionCodec_ACLBase
doc: The base codec implementation for ACL support.

CompressionLevel: The compression level to use. Higher levels will be slower to compress but yield a lower memory footprint.
PhantomTrackMode: How to treat phantom tracks. Phantom tracks are not mapped to a skeleton bone.
DefaultVirtualVertexDistance: The default virtual vertex distance for normal bones.
SafeVirtualVertexDistance: The virtual vertex distance for bones that requires extra accuracy.
ErrorThreshold: The error threshold to use when optimizing and compressing the animation sequence.
